experiment_name.description: Name of the experiment, used for reports (title and filename).

data_dir.description: Path to the directory containing fasta files.

pod5_dir.description: Path to the directory containing POD5 files.

sample_data.description: Path to the CSV file containing the sample data (if not provided, will not perform demultiplexing).

fastq_output.description: Generates FASTQ files if `true`; otherwise, generates UBAM files.

qscore_filter.description: Minimum QScore threshold for "pass" data, used in demultiplexing.

dorado_basecalling_model.description: Model used for basecalling. Check Dorado help for available options.

dorado_basecalling_gpus.description: Number of GPUs to allocate for basecalling.

dorado_demux_both_ends.description: Demultiplexes using barcodes on both ends (5' and 3') if `true`.

use_dorado_container.description: Uses Dorado via container if `true`; expects a local installation if `false`.

qc_tools.description: Specifies which QC tools to run.
